thread.title: Intel reports 4.1 percent rise in fourth-quarter revenue

title: Intel reports 4.1 percent rise in fourth-quarter revenue
text:
18 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago Intel reports 4.1 percent rise in fourth-quarter revenue   Intel Corp ( INTC.O ), which is rushing to fix recently disclosed security flaws in its chips, reported a 4.1 percent rise in quarterly revenue, helped by strong growth in its data centre business. 
The company reported a loss of $687 million, or 15 cents per share, in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 30, due to an income tax expense of $5.4 billion as a result of the recent tax reforms. 
The company had posted a profit of $3.56 billion, or 75 cents per share, a year earlier. 
Total revenue rose to $17.05 billion from $16.37 billion. 
Intelâ€™s shares were up 4.3 percent in extended trading. Reporting by Laharee Chatterjee in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty
